venue.address_2: Gloucester Street intersects & is across from the Pru
venue.name: Whiskey's

item.description:
Happy 2008!

It's time to get happy again. After a rough short week step into Whiskey's to meetup with friendly fun folk. View Outside of Whiskey's
Last week Leo suggested Whiskey's and mentioned they have .10c wings. I also noticed they offer $2.50 appetizers until 7. The price is right and it is a smokehouse, so it may be worth it...but its the drinks we care about. Right? Actually for me it is the camaraderie. Anyone wanna camarade?

Hang as long as you want but I will check out around 8....unless????

Encourage you to pay as you order or maintain your own tab
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the back wearing a purple cable knit sweater. Look for the mirrors on which I will place a meetup sign. I'll buy a drink for the first one to find me however the last person has to buy me one.
item.why: Relax and unwind after a very short work week
item.name: Whiskey's for Their Wings
